Key Match Events: Quinton de Kock scored a century
Post-Match Reflections: Cummins admits the team will take this one hard as they lose their first two World Cup matches
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch was the focus at the toss
The fielding – and in particular, the catching – was extremely poor
Others: South Africa now face the Netherlands on Tuesday in Dharamsala, before meeting England and Bangladesh
For Australia, they face another daunting task as they take on Sri Lanka, who fared a lot better against South Africa in the opening game
